root.name: Botanicula
root.description: OverviewBotanicula is a point and click adventure game, heartwarming and cute from the creators of Samorost and Machinarium. The game is set in a vibrant world filled with plant and insect like creatures with a sound and art style that can be compared to that of Rayman: Origins. The plot follows a group of five characters - Mr. Twig, Mr. Lantern, Mr. Poppy Head, Mrs. Mushroom and Mr. Feather - as they try to save the last seed of their home tree from evil parasitic creatures that have infested it.SoundtrackBotanicula soundtrack was release on 19 April 2012. Soundtrack purchase available at Bandcamp.
